import React, { useState, useEffect, useMemo } from "react"; import { Helmet, HelmetProvider } from "react-helmet-async"; import Header from "../molecules/shared/Header"; import IndustryRow from "../molecules/industries/IndustryRow"; import industriesData from "../../data/industries_test"; import CreateButton from "../atoms/Buttons/CreateButton"; const meta = { title: "", meta: [], link: [], style: [], script: [], }; export default function Industries() { const [industries, setIndustries] = useState(industriesData); const memoizedIndustries = useMemo(() => { return industries; }, [industries]); return ( <>

); }
